dialogues.text: (Gasp!) Oh no, no -- (remembers ) Wait a minute. The Captain urgently hovers across the room. Eve left alone. Her recorded memories continue playing... ..-The clip changes to It Only Takes a Moment.  63. Eve recognizes the music. Watches the lovers on screen hold hands. Something familiar about the gesture... Looks at her own hands. Slowly, she interlocks her fingers... ...Eve’s eyes go wide. This is what Wally was trying to say to her. Her memories continue on the screen: -.-a tap on the shoulder... Wally presents her the plant -- .-.-The screen goes BLACK!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then... ...SECURITY CAMERA FOOTAGE initiates. Wally’s vigil for Eve plays out: +..protecting her from the rain... ...the sun...the sandstorm... ..-keeping watch night and day... ...trying to jump start her heart...

dialogues.speaker: ON EVE
dialogues.text: Amazed at Wally’s selfless dedication to her. Realizes the meaning of Wally’s love.

dialogues.speaker: EVE
dialogues.text: (soft) Wally... She looks at her hands again. MATCH CUT TO CLOSE-UP OF WALLY’S HANDS Still waiting between the towel racks. Rehearses holding out his hand to Eve.

dialogues.speaker: WALLY
dialogues.text: Ee-vah... Ee-VAH...? EEE-vah... (gives up; beeps) [I‘1ll never get it right.] Becomes impatient. Sneaks his way over to the GARBAGE CHUTE. Sticks his head in.

dialogues.speaker: EE-VAHH
dialogues.text: No answer. The chute has an endless drop. Wally climbs in.  64. Holds himself spread eagle to stay in place. Carefully inches his way up to the Captain’s quarters...

dialogues.speaker: OUT ON THE UPPER DECK
dialogues.text: A monorail pulls up. M-O steps off. Still hot on Wally’s trail. Scrubs the dirty tracks towards the bridge lobby. Then notices Wally’s FRESH TRACKS... ...leading to the trash chute.

dialogues.speaker: M-O
dialogues.text: (beeps ) [Ah-hah! Gotcha! ]

dialogues.speaker: BACK IN THE CAPTAIN'S QUARTERS
dialogues.text: The Captain at his wet bar. Waters the plant in the sink.

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN
dialogues.text: There you go little guy. You came a long way for a drink of water... Just needed someone to look after you, that’s all -- He is struck with a notion. Stares out the window at space for a beat. Sees HIS REFLECTION holding the plant. Glances at his EARTH GLOBE.

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN
dialogues.text: (to himself) We have to go back. Activates his chair’s call button.

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN
dialogues.text: Auto, come down here!

dialogues.speaker: AUTOPILOT, (ON SPEAKER)
dialogues.text: Aye-aye, sir. Eve is still watching Wally’s vigil on the screen: playing Pong... ...Wally etches their names in a heart... Eve is lost in the moments. So touched.

dialogues.speaker: EVE
dialogues.text: (smitten) Wally... (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: EVE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (remembers ) Wally! He’s still waiting for her. She turns to leave and finds

dialogues.speaker: AUTO
dialogues.text: lowering in front of her. Auto spots the plant in the Captain’s hand. “A113” flashes on Auto’s lens.

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN
dialogues.text: Auto, Eve found the plant. Fire up the Holo-detector.

dialogues.speaker: AUTOPILOT
dialogues.text: Not necessary, Captain. You may give it to me.

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN
dialogues.text: (not listening) You know what? I should do it myself. Heads for the elevator.

dialogues.speaker: AUTOPILOT
dialogues.text: Captain! Auto shoots back upstairs. Pops out another APERTURE in front of the elevator. Blocks the Captain.

dialogues.speaker: AUTOPILOT
dialogues.text: Sir, I insist you give me the plant.

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN
dialogues.text: Auto, get out of my way.

dialogues.speaker: AUTOPILOT
dialogues.text: Sir, we cannot go home.

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN
dialogues.text: What are you talking about? Why not?

dialogues.speaker: AUTOPILOT
dialogues.text: That is classified. Captain, give me the plant.

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN
dialogues.text: (holds plant out of reach) What do you mean, “classified”? You don’t keep secrets from the Captain!  66.

dialogues.speaker: AUTOPILOT
dialogues.text: Give me the plant.

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN
dialogues.text: Tell me what’s classified!

dialogues.speaker: AUTOPILOT
dialogues.text: The plant.

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN
dialogues.text: Tell me, Auto! That’s an order! It’s a stare down. Beat.

dialogues.speaker: AUTOPILOT
dialogues.text: Aye-aye, sir. Auto rises back into the ceiling. Lowers down over the vanity console. High speed button pushing. A NEW BNL VIDEO MESSAGE appears. Labeled: “TOP SECRET: FOR AUTOPILOT EYE ONLY”. The BNL FANFARE plays. Cut to the BNL CEO at the podium. Haggard. Nervous. Wears an emergency oxygen vest. The fanfare plays too long.

dialogues.speaker: BUY N LARGE CEO
dialogues.text: (to 0.S.) Just cut it off, will ya?! (music stops; forced chuckle) Hey there, Autopilots! Uh, got some bad news. Operation Cleanup has, uh, well... failed! Wouldn’t you know, rising toxicity levels have made life unsustainable on Earth.

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN
dialogues.text: Unsustainable? What?

dialogues.speaker: BUY N LARGE CEO
dialogues.text: Darn it all, we’re going to have to cancel Operation Recolonize. (dons his life vest) So just, uh...just stay the course. Rather than try to fix this problem, it'll just be easier if everyone remains in space.

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN
dialogues.text: (offended) Easier?  67.

dialogues.speaker: CEO ADVISOR, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Mr. President, sir, it’s time to go.

dialogues.speaker: BUY N LARGE CEO
dialogues.text: Alright, uh...uh...I’m giving override directive: “A113”. Go to full autopilot. Take control of everything! And do not return to Earth! (ready to run) Repeat! Do not return to Earth! (throws on his gas mask; to camera crew) Now let’s get the heck out of here. The CEO races out of the room. The message cuts out. Auto turns to face the Captain. The Captain shakes his head in disgust.

dialogues.speaker: AUTOPILOT
dialogues.text: Now, the plant.

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN
dialogues.text: No, wait a minute. Computer, when was that message sent to the Axiom? The paused image on the holo-screen highlights. Data begins to calculate on the screen. We see YEARS SCROLL RAPIDLY BACKWARDS. It stops on “2110”.

dialogues.speaker: SHIP'S COMPUTER
dialogues.text: Message received in the year 2110.

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN
dialogues.text: That’s -- that’s nearly 700 years ago!! Auto, things have changed! We've got to go back!

dialogues.speaker: AUTOPILOT
dialogues.text: Sir, orders are: “Do not return to Earth”.

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN
dialogues.text: But life is sustainable now! Look at this plant, green and growing! It’s living proof he was wrong.

dialogues.speaker: AUTOPILOT
dialogues.text: Irrelevant, Captain.

What?! It’s completely relevant! (points out to space) Out there is our home! Home, Auto! And it’s in trouble! I can’t just sit here and...and...do nothing! That’s all I’ve done! That’s all anyone on this blasted ship has ever done...NOTHING!!

dialogues.speaker: AUTOPILOT
dialogues.text: On the Axiom you will survive.

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN
dialogues.text: I DON’T WANT TO SURVIVE! I WANT TO LIVE!

dialogues.speaker: AUTOPILOT
dialogues.text: Must follow my directive.

dialogues.speaker: DAAAARGH
dialogues.text: The Captain turns away in frustration. His eyes catch sight of the CAPTAIN PORTRAITS. Notices AUTO in every one of them. Looking over all their shoulders. A little closer every generation. The Captain slowly looks over his shoulder.. --.-and Auto is right behind him. The Captain looks at the plant in his lap. His countenance grows determined. He rights his hat... ...turns to face Auto... .--.and gives the most authoritative order of his career:

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN
dialogues.text: I'm the Captain of the Axiom. We are going home today! Auto slides into his face. Makes the Captain flinch. No more Mr. Nice Robot. Auto emits an ELECTRONIC COMMAND.

dialogues.speaker: GOPHER
dialogues.text: shoots out of a pneumatic tube. Salutes Auto. Eve immediately remembers him from the Pod She BEEPS a warning to the Captain.

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN
dialogues.text: Gopher? Gopher activates his suspension beam. Bay.  69. Snatches the plant away from the Captain.

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN
dialogues.text: Hey! That's my plant. This is mutiny! (to Eve) Eve, arrest him! Eve draws her GUN ARM. Points it at Gopher. The robot raises his epaulet arms. Don’t shoot! She opens her chest cavity. Motions for Gopher to put the plant inside her.

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN
dialogues.text: Eve, you are to put this plant straight in the Holo-detector. Gopher slowly advances towards Eve. But then tosses the plant across the room... ...-down the TRASH CHUTE.

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN
dialogues.text: No!

dialogues.speaker: EVE
dialogues.text: (hums ) [Oh no!] It’s over. The plant is gone. But in that frozen moment...

dialogues.speaker: ON TRASH CHUTE
dialogues.text: ..-THE PLANT suddenly reappears. Rises like a ghost, up from the chute. Wally’s head follows. Unawares of the plant resting on his head.

dialogues.speaker: WALLY
dialogues.text: Ee-vah?

dialogues.speaker: WALLY
dialogues.text: Wally straddles the top of the lip chute. The plant drops onto his chest. Wally looks at it with surprise.

dialogues.speaker: WALLY
dialogues.text: (beeps ) [Hey, the plant.]  70.

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN
dialogues.text: Wally! The plant!...[Toss it! Over here! ] Wally is slow to understand. Finally picks up the plant. Anticipates to throw it, when... ..-Auto lowers right in front of him, trying to block.

dialogues.speaker: AUTOPILOT
dialogues.text: Give me the plant. Eve moves to help Wally. But Gopher traps her in his suspension beam Wally dodges Auto’s multi-arm advances. Defiantly tosses the plant into his chest. Slams it shut.

dialogues.speaker: WALLY
dialogues.text: (beeps ) [You can’t have it!] Auto flips open one of his handles. Produces a TASER... ...and ELECTROCUTES Wally. Wally’s chest circuitry blows out. He wheezes... ...then drops lifelessly down the chute. Eve screams. Gopher floats her trapped form over to Auto. The button on her DEFECT BOOT is pressed. She shuts down.

dialogues.speaker: INSIDE THE GARBAGE CHUTE
dialogues.text: Gopher’s ray holds Eve over the opening. Drops her down the chute. She bangs against the sides as she tumbles.

dialogues.speaker: BACK IN THE CAPTAIN'S QUARTERS
dialogues.text: Gopher salutes Auto and exits. Auto turns to the Captain. He is in shock.

dialogues.speaker: AUTOPILOT
dialogues.text: All communications are terminated. You are confined to quarters. The power shuts off in the room. Auto rises back up through the ceiling...  71.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Captain looks up. Shakes his fist in fury.

dialogues.speaker: NO
dialogues.text: The aperture closes TO BLACK. Beat. ON EVE’S POV Black. The word “REBOOT” suddenly flashes. Her view comes into focus. Scans around. Disoriented.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve lies in a seemingly endless WAREHOUSE OF TRASH. Trash, slime, and robot parts everywhere. Piles dumped from a variety of CEILING CHUTES. Eve looks down. COMPUTER MICE crawl over her. One of them has crawled over her REBOOT button. Switched her back on.

dialogues.speaker: EVE
dialogues.text: Wally! A warning alarm sounds. Eve spots a PLATFORM, loaded with GIANT TRASH CUBES. It slides into an AIRLOCK. Inner shield doors lock and seal.

dialogues.speaker: SHIP'S COMPUTER, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Caution: Activating airlock disposal...Activating airlock disposal. The exterior hatch flies open. The vacuum of space instantly sucks out the cubed trash. Eve begins to panic. Calls out again:

dialogues.speaker: EVE
dialogues.text: Wally! Suddenly, her area is flooded in light. She flinches at the sight of  72.

dialogues.speaker: TWO GIANT COMPACTOR ROBOTS
dialogues.text: as they rumble up behind her. Headlights for eyes. They bear a slight resemblance to Wally. “WALL-A" emblazoned on their fronts. Each grab a ton of trash at once. Eve is swept up with the junk. Compact it. Spit it out... ...Eve now trapped in the side of a giant cube. Her cube is picked up. Transported to a waiting platform. Stacked with other massive cubes. Eve discovers... ...Wally trapped in the cube next to her.

dialogues.speaker: EVE
dialogues.text: Wally! He groans. Not doing well. Again the alarms kick in. The platform slides on rails... +..across the safety line... into the airlock... ...the inner shield doors begin to close...

dialogues.speaker: INSIDE THE AIRLOCK
dialogues.text: Eve needs to act fast. Her gun arm stuck inside the cube. Struggles to activate it... ...It cocks. BLASTS herself free. Flies over to Wally. He’s stuck deep in the cube...

dialogues.speaker: BACK IN THE GARBAGE DEPOT
dialogues.text: M-O suddenly drops from a ceiling chute. Lands in a pile of trash. Covered with filth.

dialogues.speaker: M-O
dialogues.text: [Primal scream. ] ON M-O’S DISPLAY POV Piles of trash everywhere. The airlock doors closing in the distance.  73. ZOOMS IN and locks on Wally. His screen reads: “FOREIGN CONTAMINANT”.

dialogues.speaker: M-O
dialogues.text: (beeps ) [I have you now! ] M-O speeds towards the airlock.

dialogues.speaker: ON EVE
dialogues.text: Tugs on Wally. Desperate to free him. He’s slow to pull loose... ...THE GAP in the doors narrows... ...Eve’s never going to make it...

dialogues.speaker: ON M-O
dialogues.text: Racing towards the doors. He’s almost at the airlock... The doors SLAM tight against his roller arms. M-O is stuck. The exterior hatch opens: .-.-Eve yanks Wally free... The trash flies out into space... She flies against the force... Fights to reach M-O... -..Grabs onto his roller...

dialogues.speaker: INSIDE THE GARBAGE DEPOT
dialogues.text: The WALL-As notice M-O stuck in the door. Slam the EMERGENCY SHUT-OFF BUTTON for the airlock. The exterior hatch closes. Eve and Wally fall to the ground in a heap. Safe. M-O still stuck in the door. Shaking uncontrollably with fear.

dialogues.speaker: M-O
dialogues.text: Whoa.

dialogues.speaker: MOMENTS LATER
dialogues.text: The WALL-As light up a SMALL WORK SPACE. Eve props Wally up against some trash. He’s barely functioning. Fades in and out of consciousness. Just his red “warning” light flashes on his meter.  74.

dialogues.speaker: EVE
dialogues.text: ("Stay awake.”) Wally... Eve gently opens his chest cavity. Examines the damage. Carefully pulls out his CIRCUIT BOARD. Charred. Shorting out. Irreparable. She flies off into the depot. Searches for a new circuit board. M-O dutifully cleaning Wally. Finishes up. His DISPLAY POV reads: “All clean.” M-O closes up. Satisfied. Wally feebly offers his hand in gratitude.

dialogues.speaker: WALLY
dialogues.text: (weak) Wally. M-O stares at the filthy hand. Cleans it. Then shakes.

dialogues.speaker: M-O.
dialogues.text: They sit in awkward silence for a beat.

dialogues.speaker: WALLY
dialogues.text: (Really?)

dialogues.speaker: WALLY
dialogues.text: (Got it.) M-O. Eve returns with FOUND CIRCUIT BOARDS. Shows each one to Wally. Will any of these work? He shakes his head with a frail “no.” Wally opens his compactor. Pulls out the plant.

dialogues.speaker: WALLY
dialogues.text: (weak) Di...rec...tive.  75. Eve holds the plant. Her “RETURN TO AXIOM SUPERIOR” flashes in her display. She considers it for a moment... .---then tosses the plant to the floor. I don’t care about the plant anymore. She holds her hand out to him.

dialogues.speaker: EVE
dialogues.text: Directive. Wally struggles to lift his hand to Eve's. He reaches out... -.--and bats her hand away. Surprises Eve. Wally pushes past her. Crawls over to the discarded plant. Gives it back to Eve.

dialogues.speaker: WALLY
dialogues.text: (weak) Errr..... Eve can’t make out what he is saying. Wally fumbles around his box. Pulls out... ...the Zippo lighter. Lights it. Eve stares at the flame.

dialogues.speaker: EVE
dialogues.text: Earth? Wally nods.

dialogues.speaker: WALLY
dialogues.text: Earth. He moves his binocular eyes up and down. Like the time he fixed his broken eye. You can fix me, Eve. With spare parts in my truck. The truck that is back on...

dialogues.speaker: EVE
dialogues.text: Earth! Earth! Her eyes light up. She understands! No time to lose. She scoops him up...  76.

dialogues.speaker: M-O
dialogues.text: (“I’m comin’!"”) Wally! M-O rushes over to Wally. Hangs onto his IGLOO LATCH with his roller. Eve raises her gun arm... .---Blasts a HOLE IN THE CEILING. Takes off with the two of them. Up through the garbage chute. The WALL-As wave goodbye.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A steward moves down the hall. Siren wailing. Scans for rogue robots. Eve and Wally’s “Warning” image on his display screen. He stops in front of...

dialogues.speaker: A YELLOW LINE
dialogues.text: painted haphazardly on the floor. Follows it to a STORAGE CLOSET door.

dialogues.speaker: STEWARD
dialogues.text: Wrong. The steward opens the closet. Inside, a PAINT-BOT hides his head in the corner. The yellow line leads straight to his rear brush. The Steward apprehends him with his SUSPENSION BEAM. Suddenly, everything begins to shake. The steward looks around, confused. A JET ENGINE NOISE builds. Seems to be coming from... .-.-the hallway TRASH CHUTE. Eve, Wally & M-O burst out from it. The paint-bot recognizes Wally. Beeps the POYSC song. Our savior has arrived! The steward’s alarm goes haywire. ON STEWARD’S POV DISPLAY He takes a snapshot: Eve, holding Wally, holding the plant...  77. -..and Eve is aiming her gun straight at camera.

dialogues.speaker: STORAGE CLOSET
dialogues.text: The terrified steward is thrown in.

dialogues.speaker: STEWARD
dialogues.text: Please hold. We are currently having technical difficul -- ! Eve locks the door on him. The trio take off down the hall. The freed paint-bot gives chase. Cheers POYSC as he follows. Wally, only half-functioning, gets an idea. Presses his PLAY BUTTON. POYSC BLARES through the hallway.

dialogues.speaker: ON VARIOUS HALLWAYS
dialogues.text: REJECTS come out of hiding as they hear the music. Parade after Eve and Wally. Hum POYSC. All following the pied piper.

dialogues.speaker: ON SCREENS AROUND THE AXIOM
dialogues.text: Eve and Wally’s “Wanted” image instantly circulates. Alarms sound. Alert screens pop up around the sleeping ship.

dialogues.speaker: SHIP'S COMPUTER, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Caution: Rogue robots...Caution: Rogue robots...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Auto observes the same “Wanted” image.

dialogues.speaker: AUTO
dialogues.text: Not possible. Raises a screen showing a DECK PLAN OF THE AXIOM. It highlights Eve and Wally’s location. Auto activates every steward on the Axiom.

dialogues.speaker: ON VARIOUS LOCATIONS ON THE AXIOM
dialogues.text: Stewards eject from their wall stations. Like ATMs jumping to life. Race in the direction of Eve. Carelessly knock over stray passengers in their way.  78.

dialogues.speaker: SHIP'S COMPUTER, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: ...-Caution: Rogue Robots...

dialogues.speaker: BACK ON THE BRIDGE
dialogues.text: Auto watches the deck plan display. Monitors the progress of all the stewards. The CAMERA DROPS THROUGH THE FLOOR, down to...

dialogues.speaker: THE CAPTAIN'S QUARTERS
dialogues.text: The Captain, still trapped. Rams his hover chair against the locked elevator door. Has no effect.

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN
dialogues.text: (hoarse; exhausted) Mutinyyy...Mute...neee...This is your last chance...Auto...You hear me?...Stupid...wheel...

dialogues.speaker: SHIP'S COMPUTER, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: ...-Caution: Rogue robots...Caution: Rogue robots... A flashing light catches his attention. Outside his window. He looks up on the SKY DOME... A GIANT “WANTED” IMAGE of Eve and Wally, holding...

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN
dialogues.text: The plant! The Captain’s eyes light up. Glances down at the OPEN MANUAL on the floor. “Plant icon + Holo-detector icon = Earth” He is filled with renewed determination.

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN
dialogues.text: Laughs) We’ll see who’s powerless now. g: Pp Lays flat in his chair. Floats under his VANITY CONSOLE like a grease monkey. Pulls off the underside panel.

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN
dialogues.text: Ah-Ha! Yanks out a bundle of wiring. Cross-connects two wires. The console powers up...  79.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eve zooms through the hallways. A BAND OF REJECTS track behind them. They reach an intersection when... .-..The CAPTAIN’S FACE appears on holo-screens all around them.

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN, (OVER INTERCOM)
dialogues.text: Testing, testing... Is this thing on?

dialogues.speaker: ALL AROUND THE AXIOM
dialogues.text: All screens display the Captain’s live feed. He’s absolutely everywhere. A few stray passengers are still up. Watch their screens in confusion.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Auto watches the Captain on the holo-screen. Furiously tries to shut off the intercom.

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN, (OVER INTERCOM)
dialogues.text: Psssst! Hey! Hey! This is the Captain I'm locked in my room. Eve, Wally, bring the plant to the Lido Deck. I'll have activated the holo-detector. Now hurry! Auto's probably going to cut me off -- The screens all go dead. Eve and Wally look at each other with determination. They're about to continue on when... A WALL OF STEWARDS block their path.

dialogues.speaker: STEWARDS
dialogues.text: Halt. Dozens of them stand in a row. Eve fires her gun. Destroys a steward. Another one quickly takes its place. Traps her arm with its SUSPENSION BEAM. She can’t shoot. The stewards advance, when suddenly... ...the Rejects charge the stewards: ...The beautician-bot deflects rays with her mirrors... ...The vacu-bot sneezes dust in their faces...  80. ...The defib-bot shocks them with her paddles... .-.-The umbrella-bot opens up... -..-Shields the others from the attack...

dialogues.speaker: BEHIND THE UMBRELLA-BOT
dialogues.text: A weak Wally activates his welding beam. Shorts out the Massage-bot’s ENERGY STRAIGHTJACKET. It goes berserk. Leaps at the entire army of Stewards. Robot parts fly everywhere. Eve and Wally can’t watch the carnage.

dialogues.speaker: BACK IN THE CAPTAIN'S QUARTERS
dialogues.text: He sets Eve’s CYLINDRICAL DEVICE on the floor behind him. It projects her stored memories.

dialogues.speaker: UP ON THE BRIDGE
dialogues.text: Auto watches steward blips disappear from his screen. A MESSAGE SCREEN pops up. It's the Captain. --.and he’s holding the plant?

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN, (ON SCREEN)
dialogues.text: Ha, ha! Look what I got, Auto! Auto’s single lens irises wide.

dialogues.speaker: AUTO
dialogues.text: Not possible.

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN, (ON SCREEN)
dialogues.text: That’s right! The plant! Oh, you want it? Come and get it, Blinky!

dialogues.speaker: AUTO
dialogues.text: No. INT. CAPTAIN’S QUARTERS - SAME The Captain hovers in front of Eve’s memory screen. It projects a STILL IMAGE OF WALLY HOLDING THE PLANT. The Captain blocks the camera’s view of Wally. Pretends to be holding the projected plant himself.

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN
dialogues.text: Ha ha! HEARS AUTO coming. Turns off the vid-com.  81. Yanks his bundle of wires out of the wall. The room goes dark again.

dialogues.speaker: CEILING
dialogues.text: The aperture opens. Auto lowers into the dark. Cautiously searches the empty room..

dialogues.speaker: AUTO
dialogues.text: Captain? Captain...? ON AUTO’S POV PANS across the portraits of other captains... +..past our present Captain... .-The eyes in the portrait dart nervously... -- wait a minute.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Captain lunges at him. Grabs Auto by the steering wheel. Hangs onto it like Cap’n Ahab in a gale. His lower extremities of no use.

dialogues.speaker: AUTO
dialogues.text: Let go. Let go. Auto panics. Zips back up through the hole in the ceiling. The Captain gets stuck between floors...

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN
dialogues.text: What too heavy for ya, huh?!

dialogues.speaker: UP ON THE BRIDGE
dialogues.text: ...-Auto tries to pull free. The Captain won’t let go. Auto ends up yanking him through. The Captain rides Auto like a bucking bronco. Auto swings violently back and forth.

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN
dialogues.text: You're not getting away from me, one-eye! -- OOF! -- Is that all you got?! Gopher drops out of his pneumatic tube. Sees the Captain fighting Auto. Charges at the Captain... ...who kicks him straight out the window...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gopher plummets... ..-his SHADOW growing over the POOL... .-.and smashes in a heap on the cement. The end.

dialogues.speaker: ON WALLY AND EVE
dialogues.text: We PAN OVER the smoking wreckage of the stewards. The massage-bot floats above it all. Pants like a wild beast. One steward still twitches. The massage-bot crushes him with one blow. Eve grabs Wally and the plant. They take off for the Concourse Level. M-O and the Rejects follow behind.

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN
dialogues.text: That’s it!...A little closer! Must..press...button. The Captain reaches his one free hand out for... ...the HOLO-DETECTOR BUTTON.

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN
dialogues.text: Gotcha! Ha ha! His hand slams down hard on it. KLAXONS sound all over the ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: .--Floodlights kick on everywhere... -The LIDO DECK POOLS automatically cover up... Stray PASSENGERS pause to take in the alarms... -SPACE-LIFE PRESERVERS burst from their hover chairs... -Inflate around their necks... GREEN LINES appear on the floors... ...SLEEPING PASSENGERS are involuntarily led out of their cabins... ...Every hover chair follows the illuminated lines...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The procedure is completely automated. The passengers are all confused. Helpless to stop it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The passengers glide in by the thousands. Form concentric circles over the closed-up pools. Fill the multi-storied balconies on all sides.  83.

dialogues.speaker: ON JOHN AND MARY
dialogues.text: They arrive together at the Lido Deck. Mary notices a group of toddlers scared and crying. A NANNY-BOT tries vainly to placate them.

dialogues.speaker: NANNY-BOT
dialogues.text: Remain calm. Remain calm.

dialogues.speaker: BRIDGE PLAZA
dialogues.text: The BNL LOGO on the floor rotates. A large cylindrical device rises from the stage... ...The ship’s HOLO-DETECTOR. JUMBOTRONS activate on the dome. Show the bridge. Everyone can see the Captain wrestling Auto. He tries to speak to them during the fight:

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN
dialogues.text: (strained; in command) Ladies and Gentlemen! This is your Captain speaking! We’re having a slight malfunction with the Autopilot! Please remain calm! The passengers get caught up in the conflict. Treat it as if it were a televised fight.

dialogues.speaker: ON THE REAR OF THE DECK
dialogues.text: Eve and Wally fly out of the transport tunnel. Make a beeline for the holo-detector. Ready and waiting for the plant... ..-almost there...

dialogues.speaker: AUTO
dialogues.text: Enough. Auto furiously spins his wheel. Throws the Captain to the floor. The entire ship lists dangerously to one side.

dialogues.speaker: ON LIDO DECK
dialogues.text: Eve and Wally slam into the holo-detector’s side. Wally drops the plant. It tumbles off the bridge plaza. Eve is forced to set Wally down.  84. He clings to the holo-detector. She flies off to retrieve the plant. The hover chairs stay locked on their lines. Passengers all slip off their chairs. Their uniform color defaults back to RED. Slowly slide across the deck. And for the first time... .-.-all of humanity reaches out to one another. CLOSE UPS of hands holding hands. Everyone piles up on the listing side. The plant is buried underneath the mass of humanity. Eve searches desperately amongst them.

dialogues.speaker: ON JOHN
dialogues.text: They hang together off their chairs. CRYING TODDLERS just above them. The kiddies slip out of their hover rings. Mary GASPS in horror. Yells to John:

dialogues.speaker: MARY
dialogues.text: John, get ready to have some kids! They purposefully let go of their chairs. Grab hands, forming a human chain. Catch the toddlers. All slide together down the Lido Deck. The TODDLERS GIGGLE the whole way down. They land at the bottom, next to Eve. An empty monorail car tips off the upper deck... .---lands on the pool level. It begins sliding down the Lido Deck. Smashes vacant hover chairs in its wake.

dialogues.speaker: MARY
dialogues.text: (Gasp)

dialogues.speaker: LOOK OUT
dialogues.text: Eve looks up. Sees the Monorail sliding towards them. She stops the car before it hits. Struggles to hold it up. Can’t let it crush the passengers below her.

dialogues.speaker: ON BRIDGE
dialogues.text: Auto keeps the ship tilted. Glides over to the HOLO-DETECTOR BUTTON. Switches it off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The holo-detector begins to lower back into the floor... Wally is still hanging onto it. Barely functioning. He uses all his strength... .-..and wedges himself under the UPPER LIP of the detecto Stops it from disappearing into the floor. The pressure squeezes Wally into a box.

dialogues.speaker: ON BRIDGE
dialogues.text: The holo-detector button buzzes and flashes. Something's wrong. Auto calls up a LIDO DECK SECURITY CAMERA VIEW. Discovers Wally wedged in the device.

dialogues.speaker: AUTO
dialogues.text: No. Auto presses down on the “off” button.

dialogues.speaker: ON WALLY
dialogues.text: The holo-detector’s hydraulics fight against him. Wally desperately fights to hold it up. Begins slowly to expand himself... ---and push the holo-detector back up!!

dialogues.speaker: ON BRIDGE
dialogues.text: The Captain watches Wally’s heroic rise on screen. Auto flips out his TASER. Jams it into the “off” button. Short circuits it.

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN
dialogues.text: Nol!

dialogues.speaker: BACK ON WALLY
dialogues.text: The holo-detector reverses full force. Crushes Wally. We can’t tell if he survived the crush. Eve calls out for him. Trapped, holding up the monorail car above the passengers

dialogues.speaker: BACK ON BRIDGE
dialogues.text: The Captain watches Wally being crushed. That's it. He braces his arms against the floor...  86. ...and rises up on HIS OWN TWO FEET...

dialogues.speaker: ON JUMBOTRON SCREEN
dialogues.text: The passengers collectively GASP. Their Captain is standing... --.and walking himself up the railing... ...towards Auto! They CHEER!

dialogues.speaker: ON BRIDGE
dialogues.text: Auto hears the distant cheering. Wonders what’s up.

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Auto! Auto whips around. Shocked to see the Captain standing (albeit wobbly). Finds himself face to face with him. Auto flips out his TASER. Rushes at him. The Captain grabs it. They wrestle. The taser ARCS in the Captain’s face. He flinches. Looks up. Sees a CONTROL PANEL high up on Auto’s column... -..and smirks. The Captain looks Auto in the eye. Raises a finger up to the control panel... -..to the “AUTOPILOT” BUTTON... -..and flicks the switch to “MANUAL”.

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN
dialogues.text: (grits his teeth) Auto, you are relieved of duty.

dialogues.speaker: AUTO
dialogues.text: Noo -- Auto is instantly turned off. The Captain smiles triumphantly. Grabs the wheel with both hands. Makes the ship level again.

dialogues.speaker: ON LIDO DECK
dialogues.text: The passengers all spill across the deck. Shaken but OK. Eve sets the monorail down. Rockets over to the holo-detector.  87. Wally is pinned under the lip of the holo-detector. Eve tries to lift it up. It won't budge. She looks back to the crowd.

dialogues.speaker: ON M-O
dialogues.text: He searches the crowd for the plant. Humans begin to stand for the first time all around him. Through his POV he spots the plant mixed in among them. “FOREIGN CONTAMINANT” flashes on his display screen.

dialogues.speaker: ON EVE
dialogues.text: She fights to keep the machine from crushing Wally furthe

dialogues.speaker: M-O, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Ee-vah! M-O holds the plant up from across the Lido Deck. The vacu-bot shoots it into the hands of a passenger. Humans and robots form an impromptu fire line. Toss it up to Eve on stage. She shoves the plant into the device. The detector instantly scans the plant.

dialogues.speaker: SHIP'S COMPUTER, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Plant origin verified. Course set for Earth. Slowly, the holo-detector rises... Wally topples out from underneath. Badly crushed and leaking oil. Eve GASPS in horror. M-O and the Rejects avert their eyes. Passengers recoil as well.

dialogues.speaker: DOME CEILING
dialogues.text: It converts into a GIANT STAR CHART. Rapidly plots a course for Earth.

dialogues.speaker: SHIP'S COMPUTER, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Ten seconds to hyperjump. Eve lifts Wally up. No sign of life.

dialogues.speaker: EVE
dialogues.text: No! WALLY!!  88. M-O'’s head drops in despair. The passengers witness grief for the first time. Begin to have new feelings of their own: sadness, sympath Mary begins to cry. Buries her head in John’s shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: MARY
dialogues.text: Oh no! Wally...

dialogues.speaker: SHIP'S COMPUTER
dialogues.text: Nine, eight, seven, six, five, four, three, two, one, zero. The ceiling countdown hits “0:00.”

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ship jumps to light speed.

dialogues.speaker: BACK INSIDE
dialogues.text: The passengers and robots are thrown off their feet. Everyone holds on to one another.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Captain struggles to keep control of the steering whe Fights the G-forces.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Humans and robots hang on for dear life. John and Mary cling to each other and the babies.

dialogues.speaker: ON EVE
dialogues.text: She holds tightly to Wally. Still calling out his name. No response.

dialogues.speaker: ON SPACE
dialogues.text: The Axiom zooms through hyperspace.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cockroach waits obediently on the hill. Exactly where Wally told him to stay. His antennae twitch with boredom.  89.

dialogues.speaker: A RED DOT
dialogues.text: appears on the ground. The cockroach watches the dot run down the hillside. The ground begins to shake. Daylight dims. The insect looks to the sky.

dialogues.speaker: ON CLOUD COVER
dialogues.text: A DARK PATCH grows behind the clouds. Blots out the sunlight. The Axiom’s keel breaks through. Its shadow swallows up the entire landscape. The cockroach senses his master’s return. HUNDREDS OF RED DOTS rush past him. He eagerly chases after them.

dialogues.speaker: ON AXIOM
dialogues.text: The city-size starliner lowers gracefully from the sky. Pushes back the clouds to the horizon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The CIRCLE OF DOTS triangulate over the abandoned berth. Converge over the port’s LANDING SHAFT. Thousands of feet deep. The ship’s keel descends into it. The earth shudders. Trash towers tumble in the distance. ---Then all is quiet.

dialogues.speaker: ON BELLY OF THE AXIOM
dialogues.text: A ROW OF GIANT DOORS open on the side of the ship. MULTIPLE GANGWAYS automatically extend. Connect with BUILT-IN TERMINALS on the port. The Captain walks out gingerly. Holding the boot w/ plant. The other passengers step out on their own legs. Wobble like toddlers. They squint up at the harsh sunlight. A commotion is heard from the back. Somebody trying to push through.

dialogues.speaker: EVE
dialogues.text: appears out of the crowd. Cradles a BOXED UP WALLY in her arms.  90. M-O and the Rejects follow behind her. They rush across the gangway. The cockroach meets up with Eve. Climbs up onto Wally. Doesn't understand why his master isn’t responding. Eve urgently scans the landscape. Locks on to WALLY’S TRUCK in the distance. She takes to the air. M-O and the Rejects chase after her down the gangway.

dialogues.speaker: M-O
dialogues.text: (beeps ) [Eve! Wait! ] The Captain respectfully removes his hat. Good luck, friend. INT. WALLY’S TRUCK The interior is dark and still. Suddenly the junk jingles and clinks as the back door ope Eve flies inside with Wally. Sets him on the floor. She scans the rotating shelves at high speed. Grabs a CAR JACK. Ratchets up Wally’s crushed body...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -SPARE PARTS being grabbed by Eve... Frantically installs the new parts into Wally... Her arms a blur of precision in motion... ...-Replaces his damaged CIRCUIT BOARD. The final piece.. ...-She opens his new solar panels...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...and BLASTS a hole in the ceiling with her gun.

dialogues.speaker: OUT ON THE EMPTY BAY
dialogues.text: The rejects stop. See the roof of Wally’s truck explode. Oh no.

dialogues.speaker: BACK IN THE TRUCK
dialogues.text: A shaft of sunlight beams down on Wally. Eve holds her breath, watches... Waits... ..-Beep... ..-Beep...  91.

dialogues.speaker: WALLY, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: (Apple “reboot” SFX) Wally’s meter fully charges. His head slowly rises from his box. Blinks. The cockroach hops with joy. Eve is relieved. -..She holds out her hand to him.

dialogues.speaker: EVE
dialogues.text: (with love) Wally... Wally gives her a blank stare. He turns away from Eve. Motors out the truck. She grabs him. Turns him back around.

dialogues.speaker: EVE
dialogues.text: (It's me!) Eve! Wally just stares. Doesn’t seem to know who she is.

dialogues.speaker: EVE
dialogues.text: (hums ) [Here, look at these. ] She grabs the RUBIK’S CUBE and LIGHT BULB from the shelf. The light bulb glows in her hand. She gives them to Wally. No reaction.

dialogues.speaker: EVE
dialogues.text: (Remember? ) Wally? Wally looks blankly at the junk on the shelves.

dialogues.speaker: EVE
dialogues.text: (hums ) [I know! ] She hovers over to the video player. Plays HELLO DOLLY. Looks back to see if it has any effect. Wally is over at the shelves. Has scooped all his prized possessions into his compactor Crushes them into a cube. Eve is gut-punched.  92. Wally motors outside. Runs over the cockroach on his way out. The insect pops back to life. Watches his friend in shock. EXT. WALLY’S TRUCK - DAY Wally rolls up to a nearby trash pile. Scoops up trash. Spits out a cube. Eve hovers over to him. Still in disbelief.

dialogues.speaker: EVE
dialogues.text: (somber ) No. Wally continues to stack his cubes. She stops him. Lifts his head. Stares into his eyes. Nobody home. Eve presses his “play” button. Nothing but STATIC. Eve begins to panic. Shakes him.

dialogues.speaker: EVE
dialogues.text: Wally...Wally! WALLY! No response. He’s gone. She hovers in silence next to him for a long time... Finally, Eve grasps Wally’s hand. Forces his fingers to interlace with hers. Holds him close one last time. Leans her head against his. Hums softly.

dialogues.speaker: EVE
dialogues.text: [Hums IOTAM] She touches her forehead to his. Goodbye Wally. A TINY SPARK between them. Eve turns to hover away. Jerked back. Her fingers caught between his. She checks his eyes again. Nothing. But then...  +..a tiny SERVO NOISE. She looks down at their hands. CLOSE ON WALLY’S FINGERS They start to move. Slowly close around Eve's. She looks back at his face. Wally’s eyes gradually come into focus. His brows raise...

dialogues.speaker: WALLY
dialogues.text: Ee-vah?

dialogues.speaker: EVE
dialogues.text: Wally! He notices their hands entwined. His dream come true.

dialogues.speaker: WALLY
dialogues.text: (amazed) Ee-vah!! She giggles.
The “Hello Dolly” tape reaches the finale of IOTAM. “And that is all that love’s about...”

dialogues.speaker: BACK OUTSIDE
dialogues.text: Eve and Wally stare into each other's eyes. M-O and the Rejects finally reach the truck. They begin to celebrate. Wally’s alive! Then M-O realizes they need privacy. Herds the Rejects 0.S.

dialogues.speaker: M-O
dialogues.text: Go! Go, go go! Wally and Eve’s foreheads touch. Together now and ever more. “,..and we’ll recall when time runs out...”

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Newly planted in the earth. Small hands water it gently. PULL OUT to reveal it surrounded by kids. The Captain instructs them. John and Mary help unload equipment from the Axiom. Robots and passengers stream off the ship.

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN
dialogues.text: This is called “farming”! You kids are going to grow all kinds of plants: vegetable plants, pizza plants! (laughs) Ahh, it’s good to be home... The CAMERA PULLS OUT from the Axiom... ---over the bay... “,..That it only took a moment...” +..past Wally & Eve holding hands in his truck... -..over M-O and the Rejects cleaning outside... ...Through the trash towers of the city... +..past a FIELD OF PLANTS, sprouting from its peak... -.-up through the cloud cover... +..out into space... “,..To be loved a whole life long.” ...-and settles on... -..our single... ---drab... ...brown... ...little planet.
